avail-alert-delete-tasks--taskId.name: Alert-Avail-test-opex-api-v2-delete-tasks--taskId
avail-alert-delete-tasks--taskId.query:
let threshold = 0.99;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.APIMANAGEMENT"
    and url_s matches regex "/tasks/[^/]+$"
  | summarize
    Total=count(),
    Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
  | where availability < threshold

avail-alert-get-info.name: Alert-Avail-test-opex-api-v2-get-info
avail-alert-get-info.query:
let threshold = 0.99;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.APIMANAGEMENT"
    and url_s matches regex "/info$"
  | summarize
    Total=count(),
    Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
  | where availability < threshold

avail-alert-get-tasks.name: Alert-Avail-test-opex-api-v2-get-tasks
avail-alert-get-tasks.query:
let threshold = 0.99;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.APIMANAGEMENT"
    and url_s matches regex "/tasks$"
  | summarize
    Total=count(),
    Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
  | where availability < threshold

avail-alert-get-tasks--taskId.name: Alert-Avail-test-opex-api-v2-get-tasks--taskId
avail-alert-get-tasks--taskId.query:
let threshold = 0.99;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.APIMANAGEMENT"
    and url_s matches regex "/tasks/[^/]+$"
  | summarize
    Total=count(),
    Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
  | where availability < threshold

avail-alert-post-tasks.name: Alert-Avail-test-opex-api-v2-post-tasks
avail-alert-post-tasks.query:
let threshold = 0.99;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.APIMANAGEMENT"
    and url_s matches regex "/tasks$"
  | summarize
    Total=count(),
    Success=count(responseCode_d < 500) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | extend availability=toreal(Success) / Total
  | where availability < threshold

resptime-alert-delete-tasks--taskId.name: Alert-RespTime-test-opex-api-v2-delete-tasks--taskId
resptime-alert-delete-tasks--taskId.query:
let threshold = 1000;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where url_s matches regex "/tasks/[^/]+$"
  | summarize
      watermark=threshold,
      duration_percentile_95=percentiles(todouble(DurationMs)/1000, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | where duration_percentile_95 > threshold

resptime-alert-get-info.name: Alert-RespTime-test-opex-api-v2-get-info
resptime-alert-get-info.query:
let threshold = 1000;
  AzureDiagnostics
  | where url_s matches regex "/info$"
  | summarize
      watermark=threshold,
      duration_percentile_95=percentiles(todouble(DurationMs)/1000, 95) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
  | where duration_percentile_95 > threshold
